S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4342: SQLSTATE 38000 (NullPointerException) at inner self join and value(x1, x2...)
Override ValueNode.remapColumnReferencesToExpressions() in CoalesceFunctionNode so that its arguments are properly remapped. The lack of remapping made the generated code access the wrong result set, eventually causing the NullPointerException.
